name: FColorMapAreaPair
comment: Copyright 2016-2018 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

properties.name: MinX
properties.comment: A top left pixel that together with MaxX/MaxY encompasses the entire area

methods.name: PostEditChangeProperty
methods.comment: When this is changed in the editor, propagate the changes to the preview window

methods.name: GenerateAreaData
methods.comment: Generate a icon for this item

methods.name: InitMapAreaTexture
methods.comment: Init the map area texture, fetches scale and offset

methods.name: GetMapAreaForWorldLocation
methods.comment: Returns the map area encompassing the world location passed

methods.name: InitFogOfWarTexture
methods.comment: Creates and inits the fog of war texture

methods.name: GetFogOfWarTexture
methods.comment: Returns the current fog of war texture that has been generated

methods.name: OnNewMapAreaVisisted
methods.comment: Called when any player enters a new area on the map, should case a redraw of the fog of war texture

methods.name: UpdateFogOfWarTexture
methods.comment: Updates the fog of war texture

properties.name: mAreaTexture
properties.comment: This is the texture that the level designers made to define areas on the map

properties.name: mFogOfWarTexture
properties.comment: The current fog of war is generated to this texture

properties.name: mAreaData
properties.comment: This is where we store the raw data we generated from the texture

properties.name: mColorPalette
properties.comment: This are all the unique colors found in the texture

properties.name: mCaptureActor
properties.comment: A cached camera in the Skye

properties.name: mDataWidth
properties.comment: The width of the data and the texture

properties.name: mUpperLeftWorld
properties.comment: Used for the map area check, world coordinate for "upper left".

properties.name: mWorldToMapScale
properties.comment: Unreal Unit to pixel of map texture scale
